text: Fradique Bandeira Melo de Menezes (born March 21, 1942) was the President of São Tomé and Príncipe from 2001 to 2011. ==References== ==Other websites== * President Menezes' address to the 63rd session of the United Nations General Assembly, September 26, 2008 Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Heads of state of São Tomé and Príncipe
title: Fradique de Menezes
